channel.title: How do i get people saying: wlecome to **** server
channel.description: Hi im wondering how i get people saying: wlecome to "****" server. when you logg in on the server. Is it one the client.java? I want to change what they saysThanx for answers[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2008, 08:45:54 am[/size][hr][quote="andriksen"]Hi im wondering how i get people saying: wlecome to "****" server. when you logg in on the server. Is it one the client.java? I want to change what they saysThanx for answers[/quote]

item.title: How do i get people saying: wlecome to **** server
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

Open up NPCHandler.java, search for the words the NPC in the server is saying, change the text, compile.
